title: Capture is complete and reliable
description: No gaps in what gets logged - cookies, headers, bodies all present

title: Investigate missing cookies in logs
description: Cookies aren't appearing in network logs - may be security filtering in CDP. Research and fix if possible.

title: Audit capture completeness
description: Systematic check: what else might be missing? Compare CDP capture vs browser DevTools Network tab for same requests.

title: Server quits with Chrome
description: Revisit the decision to keep status server running when Chrome quits. Current reasoning: enables auto-reconnect on pinned status tab. Cleaner alternative: let server quit too, status page shows 'not running', both restart together with chrome-debug. Investigate if the UX is actually worse.

title: Made chrome-log easy to adopt
description: Setup and UX polish so new users can get started without friction

title: Create tested setup flow for new users
description: End-to-end setup script that a fresh user can run. Test on a sprite or clean environment.

title: Distinctive Chrome Debug icon
description: Photonegative or color-shifted Chrome icon so users know it's the debug instance. Include in setup flow.

title: Logger tab auto-opens and pins on debug Chrome launch
description: When Chrome Debug starts, localhost:9223 should open as a pinned tab automatically.

title: Favicon pulses subtle red when recording
description: Status page favicon shows recording state - subtle pulsing red dot, not shouty. Helps user know capture is live.

title: Auto-open status page on daemon start
description: chrome-log start should open http://localhost:9223 after daemon launches (from handoff)

title: Skill works naturally in conversation
description: Claude can use the skill fluidly when users ask about network traffic

title: Polish skill writing
description: Review SKILL.md for clarity, examples, and natural language triggers. Make it easy for Claude to know when/how to use.

title: Test natural skill activation
description: Real-world test: load a page in debug browser, ask Claude 'what endpoint did that use?' - verify skill activates and finds the answer.

title: Graceful errors when Chrome Debug not running
description: CLI should give helpful messages when daemon can't connect, Chrome Debug isn't running, etc.
